messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 709
messages.msgSnippet: ... I am not sure how I would label my two difficult---active---spirited---alert-------sons.....ALL of the above and more BUT I find that what works best
messages.messageBody:
At 01:44 AM 7/31/00 +0000, you wrote:
>well, what do you suggest... if what your parents did with you as an
>active/alert child didn't work, what do you think would have worked for
>you.... maybe you could lend some quick study on this... i'm at a loss for
>how to discipline my a/a daughter... i'd love to hear some new ideas ...
>maybe shortcuts to doing the research...

I am not sure how I would label my two
difficult---active---spirited---alert-------sons.....ALL of the above and more
BUT I find that what works best (though at times I am BUSY) is some love
and immediate attention........
Love
POD
